question:
Speaker and Deputy Speaker of the Lok Sabha have to vacate their offices in which among the following conditions:
  1. The President is of the belief that the Speaker and Deputy Speaker of the Lok Sabha must vacate their offices.
  2. The Ruling party has lost the confidence in the House and now a new party has claimed to form Government in centre.
  3. Immediately after the Lok Sabha is dissolved.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The Speaker may be removed from office by a resolution passed by House of People and passed by a majority of all the then members of the House.
